  • Help

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BoardArrayFileParsingException
Thrown while parsing a CSV file describing a chessboard that was passed as a commandline argument.
BoardArrays
Contains a collection of utility methods for manipulating 2d int arrays that represent chessboards, plus a few other methods.
BoardView
This class subclasses JComponent and implements the chessboard area in the GUI where the game is played.
CastlingNotPossibleException
Thrown by Chessboard.movePiece() when processing a castling move if it turns out castling is impossible.
Chessboard
Represents a chessboard, storing a data structure, an int[8][8] array, that it uses to keep track of the state of the board.
Chessboard.Move
Represents a possible move on the board.
Chessboard.Piece
Represents a Piece on the chessboard.
CoordinatesManager
Computes and makes available (as Dimension and Insets objects) all the measurements needed by BoardView for it to draw a chessboard in its JComponent region using Graphics.fillRect() calls.
ImagesManager
Manages an images store of chesspiece icon Image objects, which it loads from an images directory.
JChessGame
The frontend of the program, a JFrame subclass that presents as the GUI to the chess program.
KingIsInCheckException
Thrown when a move would put the king in check, and that possibility eluded notice until right before the move was to be made.
MinimaxRunner
Implements the minimax algorithm with alpha/beta pruning.
MovesLog
Implements a readonly textarea that sits to the right of BoardView's chessboard in the GUI, listing every move that's made in algebraic notation format, followed by any recent errors made.
MovesLog.MoveError
Implements a record that represents an error made in the course of picking a move to play in the chessgame this program runs.
PopupColorChoice
Implements a dialog box that pops up on instantiation and says, "Welcome to the game.
PopupGameOver
Implements a dialog box that informs the player who won the chess game that just completed; JChessGame spawns it as soon as checkmate is detected for either side.
PopupPawnPromotion
Implements a dialog box that informs the player that their pawn is being promoted and giving them a choice, via radio buttons, of what piece to promote it to.
